dcmLimitOpenAssociations.title: Limit Open Associations
dcmLimitOpenAssociations.description: Limit open DICOM connections; rejects Association requests if the limit is exceeded; 0 (=no limit) if absent

dcmTrustStoreURL.title: Trust Store URL
dcmTrustStoreURL.description: URL of Trust Store with Certificates for DICOM nodes that are authorized to connect to this node; overrides dicomAuthorizedNodeCertificateReference

dcmTrustStoreType.title: Trust Store Type
dcmTrustStoreType.description: Key Store Type of Trust Store specified by dcmTrustStoreURL. JKS or PKCS12

dcmTrustStorePin.title: Trust Store Pin
dcmTrustStorePin.description: Key Store Password of Trust Store specified by Trust Store URL

dcmTrustStorePinProperty.title: Trust Store Pin Property
dcmTrustStorePinProperty.description: System property of Key Store Password of Trust Store specified by Trust Store URL

dcmKeyStoreURL.title: Key Store URL
dcmKeyStoreURL.description: URL of Key Store with private Key and certificate used to identify this DICOM node in TLS connections

dcmKeyStoreType.title: Key Store Type
dcmKeyStoreType.description: Key Store Type of Key Store specified by Key Store URL. JKS or PKCS12

dcmKeyStorePin.title: Key Store Pin
dcmKeyStorePin.description: Key Store Password of Key Store specified by Key Store URL

dcmKeyStorePinProperty.title: Key Store Pin Property
dcmKeyStorePinProperty.description: System property of Key Store Password of Key Store specified by Key Store URL

dcmKeyStoreKeyPin.title: Key Store Key Pin
dcmKeyStoreKeyPin.description: Key Password of Key Store specified by Key Store URL

dcmKeyStoreKeyPinProperty.title: Key Store Key Pin Property
dcmKeyStoreKeyPinProperty.description: System property of Key Password of Key Store specified by Key Store URL

dcmTimeZoneOfDevice.title: Time Zone of Device
dcmTimeZoneOfDevice.description: Time Zone ID of the Device; matches Java TimeZone ID
